# Learning Framework

$ <x,y> \sim \rho $ predict y with $f(x)$ parameterised sub-class $f_w(x)$

$$
  f^{*}(x) \dot{=} E(y|x) = E_{<x,y> \sim \rho}(f_w(x)-y)^2 = E_{y|x}(y) 
$$


$$
  \omega^{*} = argmin{\omega}
$$
